languages.text: "Значит, вот как все обернулось... Но мы не теряем надежды. "Обет Императора" нижайше благодарит вас за сей разговор и уделенное время, Вольный Торговец. Спокойного плавания в темных водах меж звезд".

traits.locale_text: "Значит, вот как все обернулось... Но мы не теряем надежды. "Обет Императора" нижайше благодарит вас за сей разговор и уделенное время, Вольный Торговец. Спокойного плавания в темных водах меж звезд".
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "So, this is how things turned out... But we will not lose hope. The Emperor's Vow humbly thanks you for this information and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars."
languages.original_text: "Значит, вот как все обернулось... Но мы не теряем надежды. "Обет Императора" нижайше благодарит вас за сей разговор и уделенное время, Вольный Торговец. Спокойного плавания в темных водах меж звезд".

traits.locale_text: "So, this is how things turned out... But we will not lose hope. Oath of the Emperor humbly thanks you for this information and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars."

traits.locale_text: "So, this is how things turned out... But we will not lose hope. The Emperor's Vow humbly thanks you for this information and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: « Voilà donc ce qui s'est passé... Nous garderons espoir malgré tout. Le Serment de l'Empereur vous remercie pour cette information et vos efforts, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je vous souhaite de naviguer sans encombre dans les eaux sombres des océans d'étoiles. »
languages.original_text: "So, this is how things turned out... But we will not lose hope. The Emperor's Vow humbly thanks you for this information and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà donc ce qui s'est passé... Nous garderons espoir malgré tout. Le Serment de l'Empereur vous remercie pour cette information et vos efforts, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je vous souhaite de naviguer sans encombre dans les eaux sombres des océans d'étoiles. »
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: “原来是这样……不过，我们并不会失去希望。帝皇誓约号谦卑地感谢您提供的信息，感谢您的宝贵时间，行商浪人。祝您在星际间的黑暗水域中一帆风顺。”
languages.original_text: "So, this is how things turned out... But we will not lose hope. The Emperor's Vow humbly thanks you for this information and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars."

traits.locale_text: “原来是这样……不过，我们并不会失去希望。帝皇誓约号谦卑地感谢您提供的信息，感谢您的宝贵时间，行商浪人。祝您在星际间的黑暗水域中一帆风顺。”
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "So ist es also gekommen ... Aber wir werden die Hoffnung nicht aufgeben. Die Eid des Imperators dankt Euch demütig für diese Information und für Eure Zeit, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich wünsche Euch eine sichere Reise durch die dunklen Wasser zwischen den Sternen."
languages.original_text: "So, this is how things turned out... But we will not lose hope. The Emperor's Vow humbly thanks you for this information and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars."

traits.locale_text: "So ist es also gekommen ... Aber wir werden die Hoffnung nicht aufgeben. Die Eid des Imperators dankt Euch demütig für diese Information und für Eure Zeit, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich wünsche Euch eine sichere Reise durch die dunklen Wasser zwischen den Sternen."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: «Así que eso es lo que ha sucedido... Pero no perderemos la esperanza. El Voto del Emperador le agradece que nos haya transmitido esta información y por dedicarnos un momento de su tiempo, Comerciante Independiente. Que tenga un viaje seguro a través de las oscuras aguas entre las estrellas».
languages.original_text: "So, this is how things turned out... But we will not lose hope. The Emperor's Vow humbly thanks you for this information and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars."

traits.locale_text: «Así que eso es lo que ha sucedido... Pero no perderemos la esperanza. El Voto del Emperador le agradece que nos haya transmitido esta información y por dedicarnos un momento de su tiempo, Comerciante Independiente. Que tenga un viaje seguro a través de las oscuras aguas entre las estrellas».
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 「これが事の成り行きです…ですが、希望はあります。『皇帝の誓い』号は、この情報と時間を割いてくれたことに感謝します、自由開拓者。星間の闇の水域を安全に航海されるよう願っております」
languages.original_text: "So, this is how things turned out... But we will not lose hope. The Emperor's Vow humbly thanks you for this information and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars."

traits.locale_text: 「これが事の成り行きです…ですが、希望はあります。『皇帝の誓い』号は、この情報と時間を割いてくれたことに感謝します、自由開拓者。星間の闇の水域を安全に航海されるよう願っております」
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Demek öyle... Umudumuzu kaybetmemeliyiz. İmparator'un Andı, vakti ve sağladığı bu bilgi için zatıaliniz Hür Tacir'e içten teşekkürlerini sunar. Yıldızların arasındaki karanlık sularda güvenle ilerlemenizi temenni ederim."
languages.original_text: "So, this is how things turned out... But we will not lose hope. The Emperor's Vow humbly thanks you for this information and for your time, Rogue Trader. I wish you a safe voyage through the dark waters between the stars."
